FYI. There is development in progress in the Cactus project
(http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus) to provide support for unit testing
MDB. Nothing is visible yet (all in CVS).

Note: This is about integration unit testing. If you simply want to test
from the onMessage onward, then you can Mock the JMS Message object very
easily. But you won't be able to verify that the returned message (if
any) is correctly sent back (hence the integration unit test).

You can also have a look at Jelly which provides the ability to easily
write functional tests for message driven applications using junit and
the messenger tags. http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/sandbox/jelly

Have fun,
-Vincent
